title: Data Validation Using JSON Schema
description:
Join us for a fun and practical talk about using JSON Schema to validate your data! We’ll dive into how JSON Schema can help you define the structure and rules for your data, making sure it’s clean and reliable. Whether you're working with APIs or just want to keep your data in check, we'll share tips, tricks, and real-world examples to help you get the most out of JSON Schema. Perfect for developers, data enthusiasts, or anyone curious about better data management. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to learn more about streamlining your data validation processes! https://json-schema.org/ https://pypi.org/project/jsonschema/

**Schedule**
5:45 pm - Doors Open / Social
6:30 pm - Meeting Start
7:30 pm - Wrap-up
8:00 pm - Prologue (Social in Scotts Addition)

**All events are open to all skill levels**. If you're just starting out, come to learn and feel free to ask questions. That's where the real learning happens. If you're a more seasoned developer, we'd love to learn from you. Despite what the Zen of Python says, there are usually more than one way to do something, so share your knowledge!

Join our Discord server! **https://pyrva.org/discord**
Want to sponsor PyRVA? **https://pyrva.org/donate**
Want to present? **https://forms.gle/q8w3xziArWjud5f67**
